Description: Limestone ostracon: On the recto twenty-one lines of an incomplete and faded unknown literary text. On the verso two columns of hieroglyphic text: designs for funerary texts.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London, 1868), pl. XXII.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393222) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393222)
